Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.mts.base

This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AspectSupport This is an MTS-internal utility service which supports the use of aspects.
DestinationLink The fifth station for outgoing messages.
DestinationQueue The fourth station for an outgoing message is a DestinationQueue.
DestinationQueueMonitorService This is an MTS-internal service, accessible only to child components of the MTS, that allows those components to examine the state of any given DestinationQueue.
DestinationQueueProviderService This is the factory service for getting a queue for a given destination.
LinkProtocolService Abstract layer for interacting with a LinkProtocol as a service
LinkSelectionPolicy The selection of a DestinationLink is handled by this MTS-internal service, which is accessible only to MTS components.
LinkSelectionProvisionService This MTS-internal service can be used to get and set the current LinkSelectionPolicy.
MessageDeliverer The first or second station for an outgoing message on the receive side is a MessageDeliverer (first if no serialization, second otherwise).
MessageReader This is the first station in the receiver for serializling LinkProtocols.
MessageTransportAspect Abstract specification of a aspect in the message transport subsystem.
MessageTransportRegistryService This is a utility/bookkeeping service for the MTS.
MessageWriter This is the final station in the sender for serializling LinkProyocols.
NameSupport This utility service hides the grimy details of dealing with NameServers and White Pages from the rest of the message transport subsystem.
OutOfBandMessageService Within the MTS we sometimes need to send internal messages directly to a given Agent.
QueueListener This interface describes the queue events for which listeners can be notifified via callback.
QueueProviderService Generic service specialized by DestinationQueueProviderService and SendQueueProviderService.
ReceiveLink The final station in the message transport system before an incoming message is delivered to an Agent.
ReceiveLinkProviderService This is the factory service for getting a ReceiveLink for a given destination.
Router The third station for an outgoing message.
RPCLinkProtocol.Service  
SendLink SendLink is the first station after the MessageTransportService implementation class.
SendQueue The second station for an outgoing message is a SendQueue.
SendQueueProviderService This is the factory service for getting a queue for a given sender.
SocketControlPolicy This interface is a simple version of pluggable control over network sockets.
SocketControlProvisionService This MTS-internal service can be used to get and set the current SocketControlPolicy.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLinkSelectionPolicy An abstract base implementation of LinkSelectionPolicy which handles the registration through the LinkSelectionProvisionService.
AbstractSocketControlPolicy An abstract base implementation of SocketControlPolicy which handles the registration through the SocketControlProvisionService.
AspectFactory The root class of all aspect-ready factories.
AspectSupportImpl This ServiceProvider provides the AspectSupport service, which is implemented by an inner class.
AttributedMessage An AttributedMessage is a Message with metadata, the latter represented as HashMap with String keys.
BoundComponent Root class of Components of the MTS.
DestinationLinkDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define DestinationLink delegate classes.
DestinationQueueDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define DestinationQueue delegate classes.
DestinationQueueFactory This Component implements the DestinationQueueProviderService, which makes DestinationQueues on demand, and the DestinationQueueMonitorService, which allows clients to be notified of queue events.
LinkProtocol The parent class of all Link Protocols.
LinkSelectionPolicyServiceProvider This ServiceProvider provides the LinkSelectionPolicy service.
LoopbackLinkProtocol This protocol Component handles intra-node message traffic.
MessageDelivererDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define MessageDeliverer delegate classes.
MessageDelivererFactory This ServiceProvider provides the MessageDeliverer service, which is implemented by a singleton MessageDelivererImpl.
MessageDelivererImpl The default, and for now only, implementation of MessageDeliverer.
MessageProtectionAspect This Aspect puts the MessageProtectionService streams in place.
MessageProtectionServiceImpl This ServiceProvider both provides and implements the MessageProtectionService.
MessageReaderDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define MessageReader delegate classes.
MessageReaderImpl Default implementatiom of MessageReader that uses a trivial ObjectInputStream extension to delegate calls to the original ObjectInput.
MessageReply This simple extension of AttributedMessage should be used only for replies.
MessageStreamsFactory This factory is used to create MessageReaders and MessageWriters with a specific list of Aspects.
MessageTransportRegistry The MessageTransportRegistry ServiceProvider singleton is a utility instance that helps certain pieces of the message transport subsystem to find one another.
MessageTransportServiceProvider This Component and Container is the ServiceProvider for the MessageTransportService.
MessageTransportServiceProxy Currently the only implementation of MessageTransportService.
MessageWriterDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define MessageWriter delegate classes.
MessageWriterImpl Default implementatiom of MessageWriter that uses a trivial ObjectOutputStream extension to delegate calls to the original ObjectOutput.
MinCostLinkSelectionPolicy A cost-based LinkSelectionPolicy that chooses the cheapest link.
NameSupportDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define NameSupport delegate classes.
NameSupportImpl This ServiceProvider provides the NameSupport service.
ReceiveLinkDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define ReceiveLink delegate classes.
ReceiveLinkFactory This ServiceProvider both provides and implements the ReceiveLinkProviderService.
ReceiveLinkImpl The only current implementation of ReceiveLink.
RouterDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define Router delegate classes.
RouterFactory This ServiceProvider provides the Router service.
RPCLinkProtocol This is the parent class of all LinkProtocols that use a remote-procedure-call (rpc) semantics.
SendLinkDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define SendLink delegate classes.
SendLinkImpl The only implementation of SendLink, instantiated once per MessageTransportClient.
SendQueueDelegateImplBase Convenience class for aspects which define SendQueue delegate classes.
SendQueueFactory This ServiceProvider provides and implements the SendQueueProviderService.
SendQueueImpl The default, and for now only, implementation of SendQueue.
ServerSocketWrapper This class is a delegating ServerSocket that simply passes all methods to another socket.
SocketDelegateImplBase This class is a delegating Socket that simply passes all methods to another socket.
SocketFactory This is an RMISocketFactory that can wrap ServerSockets and apply Aspect delegates to client Sockets.
SocketFactorySPC Provide SocketFactoryService via the std (aspected) MTS for the rest of the world.
StandardAspect Default base Aspect class.
 

Exception Summary
CommFailureException This Exception indicates a DestinationLink general communications failure.
CougaarIOException Parent class of COUGAAR-specific IOExceptions.
DontRetryException This kind of IOException should be thrown if the receiving node wants to indicate to the sending Node that it should not retry sending a given message even though that message failed to be delivered.
MessageSecurityException This class of Exceptions is thrown by the security services if a message fails to be delivered for security reasons and if the send should therefore not be retried.
MessageSerializationException This class of Exceptions is thrown if a message fails to be delivered for serialization reasons and if the send should therefore not be retried.
MessageTransportException This Exception class contains the information for throwing an exception for the invalid messages by the Message Transport Service For the first version of this class the exceptions diffferentiated by the int type passed in during construction.
MisdeliveredMessageException This Exception is thrown when the message is delivered to a Node that does not contain the target Agent, probably because the agent has moved.
NameLookupException This Exception generally indicates a failed call to the White Pages from within the MTS.
TransientIOException Special kind of IOException whose stack trace shouldn't be logged.
UnregisteredNameException This Exception indicates a type of Link Protocol failure and it is thrown when the destination address specified could not be obtained from the Name Lookup Service i.e destination address is not created yet.
UnresolvableReferenceException This Exception appears to be unused.
 

Package org.cougaar.mts.base Description

This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol.

This package contains all the classes necessary to create a loopback MTS, but does not contains MTS extensions necessary to support inter-node communications or metric service.

For a more complete description of the MTS, see Message Transport Service online manual .
